name: Tower of Hanoi (NISH_Original)
description:
It's a simple tower of Hanoi game, where you have to move all the rings from the red, to the blue pillar, in the same order of the biggest ring in the bottom and the smallest ring on tope

RULES:

-> You can move one ring at a time from one pillar to another.
-> You CANNOT place a bigger ring on top of a smaller ring.
